articles.title: Clear link between AstraZeneca vaccine and rare blood clots in brain, says top EMA official - India Today
articles.description: A senior official for the European Medicines Agency in an interview said it's now clear that there is a link between AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccine and the instances of very rare blood clots. He added that it is not known what exactly causes these reactions.

articles.title: Clock is ticking on Honda Civic Type R orders - Autocar - NZ Autocar
articles.description: The end of an era will come later this year, as Honda’s European division prepares to close its Swindon production plant — simultaneously ending production of the current award-winning FK8-generation Civic Type R.
